body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer service team at BrightStay Hotels. My name is Donald Davis. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Diana Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at one of your hotels and I had an issue with the staff's friendliness.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Diana. To better assist you, could you provide me with your booking confirmation number and the specific date of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My booking confirmation number is five six seven eight and I stayed on the twenty first of September.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. I'll look into the matter regarding the staff's behavior. Could you also share your email address for further correspondence regarding this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is diana.smith@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the necessary details, Diana. I will investigate this matter and get back to you soon. I appreciate your time and feedback.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting BrightStay Hotels. Have a great day, Diana!
